attributes.action: Let the Country elect its PM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We live in a democratic state. We should be able to decide who is the PM. The country voted in "Labour" based on Tony Blair being the PM. Let the people of the United Kingdom Vote for our PM.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
